scripts.build: npm run build-core && npm run build-react && npm run build-html
scripts.build-core: cd packages/core && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-react: cd packages/ui-react && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-html: cd packages/ui-html && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.clean: npm run clean-core && npm run clean-react && npm run clean-html
scripts.clean-core: cd packages/core && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean-react: cd packages/ui-react && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.clean-html: cd packages/ui-html && npm run clean && cd ../..
scripts.test-core: cd packages/core && npm run test && cd ../..
